QuestData.Title: Raining Down Destruction
QuestData.Description: Beneath us is iron's ancient bastion, Thor Modan. Thousands of years ago, the stone giants tore the land asunder, collapsing part of the city and exposing much of the rest.$B$BEven now, the iron dwarves attempt to reclaim their old capital, but we will not permit it. My giants fill the trench with boulders and debris, hoping to seal it off and kill the servants of iron as they work. Take up the boulders you see near the trench to the northeast, and help us put an end to their efforts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kurun on the hill overlooking Thor Modan wants you to disrupt the iron dwarves' work by throwing boulders into the exposed area of Thor Modan.
QuestData.RewardText: As quickly as we're able to fill the trench, the iron dwarves keep clearing it. Our assault from above will not take the city alone. You must aid the earthen fighting in the plaza below.
